attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Servicemen and women go on operations knowing they are putting their lives on the line for practicaly the same pay as a traffic warden. In order to ensure a well motivated force we believe that troops should get above inflation pay rises and that more money should be spent on their welfare with more generous allowances for housing, food, tax relief and schooling. In addition, we feel that pay should continue to rise above the level of inflation if the level of deployment continues.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
